To make up for the classes missed during California's new Planned Power Outage Season, I began livecasting lectures via the video streaming platform Twitch. The format proved popular, so this quarter I am continuing to stream monthly lectures on topics outside the range of normal Classics coursework. Watch live video from thesquareprofessor on www.twitch.tv
